DOC.brief_summary: This first-in-human dose-escalation study is to characterize the safety, tolerability, pharmacokinetics and pharmacodynamics of LEQ506 given orally on a daily dosing schedule in patients with advanced solid tumors.
DOC.brief_title: A Dose Finding and Safety Study of Oral LEQ506 in Patients With Advanced Solid Tumors
